metadata.description: Enhanced clinical trial data extraction keywords for melanoma research with complete keyword coverage and NA logic implementation

safety.description: All safety-related fields use 'NA' for missing values

efficacy.description: All efficacy-related fields use empty string for missing values

administrative.description: Administrative fields use empty string for missing values

fields.name: Major country where clinical trial is conducted
Generic name
fields.format: Drug name or Drug A + Drug B for combinations

fields.name: PFS rate at 12 months or 1 year
PFS rate at 24 months or 2 years
PFS rate at 36 months or 3 years
PFS rate at 48 months or 4 years
OS rate at 12 months or 1 year
OS rate at 24 months or 2 years
OS rate at 36 months or 3 years
OS rate at 48 months or 4 years
Length or duration of measuring median PFS
Length or duration of measuring median OS
Median Duration of response or DOR
TEAE led or leading to treatment discontinuation
TRAE led or leading to treatment discontinuation
AE led or leading to death
TEAE led or leading to death
TRAE led or leading to death
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "AE" Immune related adverse events (irAEs)
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TEAE" Immune related adverse events (irAEs)
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TRAE" Immune related adverse events (irAEs)
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "AE" Cytokine Release Syndrome or CRS
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TEAE" Cytokine Release Syndrome or CRS
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TRAE" Cytokine Release Syndrome or CRS
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "AE" Neutrophil count decreased
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TEAE" Neutrophil count decreased
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TRAE" Neutrophil count decreased
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "AE" White blood cell (WBC) decreased
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TEAE" White blood cell (WBC) decreased
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TRAE" White blood cell (WBC) decreased
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "AE" Alanine aminotransferase
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TEAE" Alanine aminotransferase
Grade 3+ or Grade 3 higher "TRAE" Alanine aminotransferase

safety_fields.description: All safety-related fields (AE, TEAE, TRAE, Grade classifications) use 'NA' for missing values

efficacy_fields.description: All efficacy-related fields (ORR, PFS, OS, survival rates) use empty string for missing values

administrative_fields.description: All administrative fields use empty string for missing values

percentage.description: Extract numeric value only, no % symbol

numeric.description: Extract numeric value only, no units

months.description: Extract months value, special handling for 'not reached'

treatment_arm_rules.dose_specification: Include dose in name for same drug different doses

missing_data_protocol.never_infer: Do not guess or infer missing data
missing_data_protocol.safety_na: Use 'NA' for all safety-related missing values
missing_data_protocol.efficacy_empty: Use empty string for all efficacy-related missing values
